title: Tag for Software Version 1.0 as described in the roadmap?

content.raw:
I'd like to work with Software Version 1.0 as described in #!/osrf/subt/wiki/roadmap. 

However the instructions at #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall instruct me to install current master which seems to be in flux currently. Is there a tag or branch I can checkout instead?

Also the link https://s3.amazonaws.com/osrf-distributions/subt_robot_examples/releases/subt_robot_examples_latest.tgz points to a tip rather than to something compatible with the repository.

My colleagues installed the system some time ago and got a working system but with the current communications refactoring, it is no longer true.
content.html:
I'd like to work with Software Version 1.0 as described in #!/osrf/subt/wiki/roadmap.

However the instructions at #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall instruct me to install current master which seems to be in flux currently. Is there a tag or branch I can checkout instead?

Also the link https://s3.amazonaws.com/osrf-distributions/subt_robot_examples/releases/subt_robot_examples_latest.tgz points to a tip rather than to something compatible with the repository.

My colleagues installed the system some time ago and got a working system but with the current communications refactoring, it is no longer true.
